chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t

Premises:
ad = N : Set
preDTA_produit = fix preDTA_produit (d0 d1 : preDTA) {struct d1} : preDTA := match d0 with | @M0 _ => match d1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a0 s0 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M1 state a1 s1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M2 state s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit
preDTA = Map state : Set
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
iad_conv = fun a0 a1 : ad => match a0 with | 0%N => match a1 with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_0 p1) end | N.pos p0 => match a1 with | 0%N => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_1 p0) | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_2 p0 p1) end end : ad -> ad -> ad
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty
predta_inter_def_0 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t : term -> Prop
predta_inter_def_1 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t : term -> Prop
pl_produit_rec_0 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance d1 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 -> pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1 -> pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1)
pl_produit_rec_2 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp : pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl plp -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 /\ pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1
pl_produit_rec_1 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl -> liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl -> pl_tl_length pl0 (lst_length tl) -> pl_tl_length pl1 (lst_length tl) -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u -> reconnaissance d3 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl
pl_produit_rec_3 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat), liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u /\ reconnaissance d3 a1 u) -> liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl /\ liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl
predta_produit_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
predta_produit_5 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) a = Some s -> exists (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), a = iad_conv a0 a1 /\ MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 /\ MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
predta_produit_4_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a2 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a1 = Some s2 : preDTA -> Prop
predta_produit_3_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a1 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a2 = Some s2 : preDTA -> Prop
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
predta_produit_4 : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a2 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a1 = Some s2
predta_produit_3 : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a1 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a2 = Some s2
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
predta_produit_0 : forall (a : ad) (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a s d) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
iad_inv_inv_0 : forall a0 a1 : ad, iad_conv_inv (iad_conv a0 a1) = cpla a0 a1
predta_produit_0d_def = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a s d) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1) : preDTA -> Prop
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
predta_produit_1 : forall (a : ad) (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a s d) (iad_conv a1 a0) = Some (s_produit s1 s0)
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
predta_produit_1_def = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a s d) (iad_conv a1 a0) = Some (s_produit s1 s0) : preDTA -> Prop
pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
iad_inv_inv_1 : forall a a0 a1 : ad, iad_conv_inv a = cpla a0 a1 -> iad_conv a0 a1 = a
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
predta_compatible_compat_0 = fun (d1 : preDTA) (_ : predta_compatible (M0 state) d1) (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (H0 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0) (_ : MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1) => let H2 : Some s0 = Some s0 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 := match H0 in (_ = y) return (y = Some s0 -> mpl_compat s0 s1) with | eq_refl => fun H2 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0 => (fun H3 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0 => let H4 : False := eq_ind (MapGet state (M0 state) a0) (fun e : option state => match e with | Some _ => False | None =>...

```coq
unfold predta_inter_def_0. intros d0 d1 a0 a1 t H.
apply reconnaissance_ind with (P := fun p a t => predta_inter_def_1 t).
- intros. unfold predta_inter_def_1. split; intros.
  + apply rec_dta with (ladj := s0); auto.
  + apply rec_dta with (ladj := s1); auto.
- intros. unfold predta_inter_def_1.
  rewrite <- IHrecognition1; auto.
  rewrite <- IHrecognition2; auto.
Qed.```

original: unfold predta_inter_def_0. intros d0 d1 a0 a1 t H. apply reconnaissance_ind with (P := fun p a t => predta_inter_def_1 t). - intros. unfold predta_inter_def_1. split; intros. + apply rec_dta with (ladj := s0); auto. + apply rec_dta with (ladj := s1); auto. - intros. unfold predta_inter_def_1. rewrite <- IHrecognition1; auto. rewrite <- IHrecognition2; auto.
